name: Send new TextIt flow responses to new rows on Google Sheets
description: Every time a new response is received in Textit, Make will automatically add selected data from the Textit to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1V0XA3DMCOspL-cWBT1Edn7gF7KHeSobNwyn0n4cnBQI/edit?usp=sharing)
